title: Did you know this secret of Lua functions? #short
transcript: did you know about this secret feature in Lua have there been in a situation where you have a bunch of different parameters it gets pretty silly typing them all out right well this is where the special little dot dot dot that little Ellipsis allows you to pass in different amounts of parameters so how do I get all of these values well I simply pack them into a table and then I can leap through them like any other array and if we give that a run there we go hello John Mary Joseph and Sarah
